name: 21 Years
description:
A short game about gambling with your life, literally.

A shady gameshow host challenges you to a few hands of Black Jack. If you beat him your life gets extended. If you lose? Well, you die.

A game for Ludum Dare 44 by-
Abhishek Agarwal
Abhishek Khade
Achintya Bisht
Sri Ganesh
Ujwal Kumar
